message: I'll take most of the money, but I'm willing to give you a small share to show good faith. We can work out a better deal later.
I think it's fairer to split the money more evenly. This is my first offer, but I'm open to discussing a better split.

Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I still need a larger portion to make it worth my while.  We can't keep rejecting each other's offers - this inflation is hurting us both!
